Classification: Reality
Genre: Celebrities | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays, Thursdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: July 04, 2012

When I Get Older follows John Simpson, Gloria Hunniford, Lesley Joseph and Tony Robinson as they all give up their comfortable and busy lives to experience old age in a world away from their own. Each of them move in with pensioners whose experiences epitomise the tough challenges facing senior citizens around the country.
